name: Fantasy
description: Magic, mythical creatures, and epic worlds where imagination rules.

name: Romance
description: Love stories, emotional journeys, and complex relationships.

name: Science Fiction
description: Futuristic technology, space exploration, and speculative scientific possibilities.

name: Mystery
description: Whodunits, investigations, and suspenseful plots that keep readers guessing.

name: Non-Fiction
description: Real-world stories, biographies, history, and factual accounts.

name: Historical Fiction
description: Stories set in the past, blending real historical events with imaginative narratives.

name: Thriller
description: Fast-paced, high-stakes stories filled with tension, danger, and unexpected twists.

name: Horror
description: Dark tales designed to frighten, shock, or unsettle readers with suspense and terror.

name: Young Adult
description: Stories centered on teenage protagonists navigating coming-of-age experiences.

name: Fiction
description: Narrative works created from imagination, covering a wide range of genres and themes.

name: Books and reading
description: Works about literature, book culture, and the act of reading itself.

name: Juvenile Fiction
description: Stories aimed at children and pre-teens, often with adventure, lessons, and imagination.

name: American fiction
description: Fiction written by American authors, reflecting U.S. culture, history, and perspectives.

name: College students
description: Books featuring college life, academic settings, and young adult challenges.

name: Artists
description: Stories or biographies exploring the lives, struggles, and creativity of artists.

name: Performing Arts
description: Works focusing on theater, dance, music, and other forms of live performance.

name: Young Adult Fiction
description: Fiction targeted at teen readers, often addressing identity, growth, and relationships.

name: Comics & Graphic Novels
description: Narratives told through illustrated panels, blending art and storytelling.

name: Genetic engineering
description: Books exploring genetics, biotechnology, and ethical questions around modifying life.

name: Astronauts
description: Stories about space exploration, astronautsâ€™ lives, and the challenges of space travel.

name: Reference
description: Informational works meant for consultation, research, or practical guidance.

name: Cousins
description: Stories exploring family relationships, especially those between cousins.

name: Courtship
description: Books focusing on romantic pursuit, dating, and traditional courtship rituals.

name: Alabama
description: Books set in or about the state of Alabama, its culture, history, and people.

name: Literary Criticism
description: Analyses, interpretations, and evaluations of literature and its themes.

name: Poetry
description: Works written in verse, expressing ideas, emotions, and stories through rhythm and imagery.

name: History
description: Accounts and analyses of past events, civilizations, and historical figures.

name: Amnesia
description: Stories exploring memory loss, identity, and the mystery of forgotten pasts.
